programme.title: The First 48 - Taken
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 2 When a young man and his pregnant fiance are executed after a failed ransom attempt, Atlanta Homicide will stop at nothing to identify the elusive suspect.

programme.title: The First 48 - Down a Dark Hallway
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 3 In Tulsa, detectives struggle to find a lead when a beloved grandfather is gunned down in his own home.

programme.title: The First 48 - Tricked/Rogue Gun
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 4 In Mobile, a 21-year-old woman is shot dead in her hotel room by a mysterious visitor. When a 42-year-old music producer is found riddled with bullets in his Gwinnett County apartment, clues point toward a madman on a shooting spree.

programme.title: The First 48 - Dead Stop/Uninvited
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 5 In Atlanta, when a young father is found dead in his home by his girlfriend, detectives track down the killer and find things are not as they appear. In Tulsa, a teenager is fatally shot, sending the Tulsa team on a desperate search for the motive.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Invader
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 6 In Tulsa, a father of three is gunned down in front of his family during a deadly crime spree. Detectives race to track down his killer before anyone else gets hurt.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 7 In Tulsa, a homeless man is beaten and stabbed to death, leading detectives to witnesses that live under the bridge where he was discovered.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - A Murder in Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In 1989, 21-year-old Lyle and 18-year-old Erik Menendez walked into their parents' den and killed them.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - A Family With a Dirty Secret
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The Trial of the Century takes a shocking turn when the defense says Erik and Lyle Menendez killed their parents after years of sexual abuse.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - Abuse Excuse?
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Erik Menendez recalls his mother's decline in the years leading up to the murders and looks on in agony as his brother Lyle testifies, vividly describing the abuse at the hands of their father.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - Trials and Reversals
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The first trial ends in a stunning surprise verdict. Erik alone takes us inside the prep for his second trial, his unlikely connection with OJ Simpson, and why he alone is left to speak for both the brothers

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All - Final Verdict
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 After the verdict comes in, at the last minute, Erik Menendez and his brother, Lyle, are sent to separate prisons. Erik marries and begins to mount an appeal. Will his case be given another chance?

programme.title: Waco: Madman or Messiah - Waco: Madman or Messiah - Part 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Followers from around the world travel to Mount Carmel to hear the preaching of David Koresh, a local Texas working-class kid turned prophet of God and leader of the religious group The Branch Davidians.

programme.title: Waco: Madman or Messiah - Waco: Madman or Messiah - Part 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The raid of Mount Carmel develops into a 51-day stand-off between the Branch Davidians and the FBI. A direct line of communication is established between FBI negotiators and David Koresh on the inside.

programme.title: Fly Over Earth - Fly Over Earth
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Footage of some of the most scenic destinations the world.

programme.title: Fireplace: Banff - Fireplace: Banff
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 A truer-than-life fireplace filmed in Banff, Canada.

programme.title: Fireplace: Banff - Fireplace: Banff
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A truer-than-life fireplace filmed in Banff, Canada.

programme.title: Fireplace - Fireplace
programme.desc: Season 1, Laurentians, Canada.

programme.title: Fireplace - Fireplace
programme.desc: Season 1, Laurentians, Canada.

programme.desc: Season 1, Laurentians, Canada.

programme.title: Baylys Beach & Kai iwi Lake: New Zealand - Baylys Beach & Kai iwi Lake: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, A tour of New Zealand's Baylys Beach and Kai iwi Lakes.

programme.title: Wairere Falls: New Zealand - Wairere Falls: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, The Wairere Falls, a 153-metre waterfall, in New Zealand.

programme.title: Nelson Lake & Te Anau Lake: New Zealand - Nelson Lake & Te Anau Lake: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Rolling hills, glacial lakes, vast skies, and forests and mountains make up the scenery of the Nelson and Te Anu lakes of New Zealand.

programme.title: Haast Falls: New Zealand - Haast Falls: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Haast Pass, the peak home to these roaring falls of melted glacial waters. Mysteriously misty forests, gorgeous nature trails, and local wildlife.

programme.title: Watu Leter & Goa Cina Beach: Indonesia - Watu Leter & Goa Cina Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring the remote coasts of Indonesian beaches with limestone stacks in the bay.

programme.title: Waimamaku Beach: New Zealand - Waimamaku Beach: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring the remote, cliff-lined, cavernous coastline of Waimamaku Beach.

programme.title: Atuh Beach: Indonesia - Atuh Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Take a tour of beautiful Indonesian waters, surrounded by impressive rock formations.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways - Playa Las Galeras, Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Greens Prairie Murder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 307 Greens Prairie Murder tells the story of Virginia Freeman, the exhaustive investigation into her murder and how, after nearly four decades, police were finally able to solve the case.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - And Justice for All
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 In St. Augustine, FL, Jesse Whitley is a small-time scoundrel who drives off on a stormy night, never to return. His body is found floating in the St. John's river, and police have a list of suspects. It takes 17 years to bring his killer to justice.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - The Death of a Genius
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 Detectives searching for wealthy scientist Walter Sartory believe he's been kidnapped and is being held hostage for his fortunes. Chris Hansen discovers that investigators were in a race against time to find Walter before it was too late.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fatal Showdown / Deadly Text
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 15 In Tulsa, a man is gunned down in broad daylight, but the truth may be more than it appears. Meanwhile in New Orleans, a man is shot eight times in his own home.

programme.title: The First 48 - Tricked/Rogue Gun
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 4 In Mobile, a 21-year-old woman is shot dead in her hotel room by a mysterious visitor. When a 42-year-old music producer is found riddled with bullets in his Gwinnett County apartment, clues point toward a madman on a shooting spree.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Nightmare/Birthday Girl
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 In Cleveland, a 14-year-old girl was gunned down at her own birthday party when rival gangs opened fire.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Date Night
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 Just four days before Christmas 2013, a single mother of five is shot twice, dumped in a East Cleveland street, and ran over by the killer.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Disappeared / Red Handed
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Now that some of our strongest cases have been adjudicated and many cases have some compelling new developments, we take viewers inside the powerful and dramatic events that unfolded after the arrest.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Innocent Lost
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 In July of 2006, Miami detectives Rolando Garcia and Orlando Silva responded to the shooting death of nine-year-old Sherdavia Jenkins. After a three-week investigation, detectives were able to close their case, charging two men with second-degree murder.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Two-Faced Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 43 When one bodybuilder wants what another bodybuilder has, the end result is a murder-for-hire. The muscle-bound mastermind goes on the run for nearly a decade only to resurface half a world away.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Bobby Joe Long
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 48 A serial killer terrorizes Tampa, Florida’s red-light district, targeting women of the night at random.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - An Opportunity to Kill
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 53 A look at an ex-marine who gets the urge to kill after spotting Amyjane.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Seduced to Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 58 A look at a seductress who kills two Georgia policemen for their life insurance benefits.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - The Talking Dead
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 43 Claiming to be possessed by the spinster spirit of a murdered woman she barely knew, a New Orleans nurse leads cops straight to the killer.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Gaslighter
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 49 A cupcake-baking homemaker gets away with murder. That is, until she tries it on husband number two.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Sister Act
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 An anti-drug crusader's home is torched. But when a body is discovered in the freezer, the curious case of arson becomes a twisted tale of fratricide.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Emoji Overkill
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 27 A Texas father takes his spoiled teenage daughter to an exclusive Caribbean resort and somehow ends up packed in his own suitcase.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Cloud Minders
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 21 To acquire the resources to cure a space plague, Kirk must resolve a mining dispute between the cultural elites of the cloud city of Stratos and the miners on the surface.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Savage Curtain
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 22 Kirk and Spock meet Abraham Lincoln and Surak of Vulcan and must battle with some of history's most terrible villains.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 23 Kirk, Spock, and McCoy enter a time portal and get stuck in the past on a planet about to be consumed by a nova.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Turnabout Intruder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 24 The Enterprise is in danger when Janice Lester, one of Kirk's former lovers, steals his body.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Ensigns of Command
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 149 After a century of silence, the Enterprise receives a message from the Sheliac system informing them that they have discovered a human colony on a world in their sector.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Evolution
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Survivors
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 151 The Enterprise responds to a distress call from Rana IV, a Federation colony that is under attack from an unknown alien ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Who Watches the Watchers
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 152 A proto-Vulcan culture worships Captain Picard and prepares to offer Counselor Troi as a sacrifice.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Bonding
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 153 A startling surprise awaits the crew of the Enterprise when a mission costs the life of a crew member, who left her son behind.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Booby Trap
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 154 The Enterprise picks up ancient radio signal code from the ruined planet Aurelius 9, remnants of the total war over 1,000 years ago between Mentaurs and Promelians which caused both races' extinction.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Enemy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 155 LaForge gets left behind on a storm-plagued planet when the rest of his team encounters a Romulan warrior.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Price
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 156 While the Enterprise hosts negotiations for control of a stable wormhole, Troi forms a personal relationship with an opposing negotiator, unaware of his true being.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Vengeance Factor
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 157 The Enterprise pursues a race of "gatherers" who continue to raid Federation outposts, unaware of the dangers lurking among them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Defector
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 158 When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of an impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A young woman lying in a hospital bed, her head wrapped in bandages, awaits the outcome of a surgical procedure performed by the State in a last-ditch attempt to make her look 'normal'.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nick of Time
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A pair of newlyweds stopping in a small town are trapped by their own superstition when playing a fortune-telling machine in a local diner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Lateness of the Hour
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 The daughter of an inventor objects to their 'perfect' home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Trouble with Templeton
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.

programme.title: Vice (2015) - Vice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Bruce Willis and Thomas Jane star in this sci-fi thriller about the ultimate resort where customers can play out their wildest—and darkest—fantasies with artificial inhabitants who look like humans.

programme.title: Rollerball - Rollerball
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.title: Outlander - Outlander
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A man from another world crash lands on Earth during the age of the Vikings.

programme.title: Vice (2015) - Vice

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Rules Of Engagement
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 18 The Klingon Empire accuses Worf of wantonly destroying a Klingon civilian ship during a battle.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Hard Time
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 19 After an alien race implants false memories of a twenty-year prison sentence into O'Brien's brain, he has trouble readjusting to station life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Shattered Mirror
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 Sisko follows his son into a war-torn alternate universe after Jake is lured there by the living counterpart of his late mother.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Muse
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 21 While Odo provides shelter for a pregnant Lwaxana Troi, Jake Sisko falls under the spell of a mysterious woman.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - For The Cause
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 22 Sisko is shocked to learn that his girlfriend, Kasidy Yates, may be a Maquis smuggler.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Quickening
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 Attempting to stop a group of Jem'Hadar renegades from gaining power, Sisko and the Defiant crew must join forces with deadly Jem'Hadar soldiers.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - To The Death
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 Bashir tries to save a Gamma Quadrant society afflicted with an incurable, terminal disease by the Jem'Hadar.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Body Parts
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 25 Misdiagnosed with a terminal disease, Quark sells his body parts on the Ferengi market to pay off his debts, then finds himself unable to break the contract.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Broken Link
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 26 Odo is forced to return to the homeworld of his people and face judgment for killing one of his own.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Apocalypse Rising
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 Sisko, Odo, O'Brien, and Worf enter Klingon territory on a suicide mission to expose Gowron, the Klingon leader, as a Changeling.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Ship
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 A severely injured crewmember's life hangs in the balance as Sisko battles for control of a crashed Jem'Hadar warship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Looking For Par'mach In All The Wrong Places
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 Worf helps Quark woo a visiting Klingon woman, even though he is in love with her.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - ...Nor The Battle To The Strong
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Trapped on a planet under Klingon attack, Jake Sisko panics in the heat of battle.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Trials And Tribble-Ations
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 Sisko travels back in time to a pivotal moment in the history of the original Starship Enterprise.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 This episode includes: Lourdes (Pts. 1 & 2), UD: Drug Playboy, Sunnyvale Stalker and Tornado Baby & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 7 This episode includes: St. James' Ghost, Ghostly Attraction, Where Is She Now? and Calling Dr. Fraud & UD

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 This episode includes: Mental Daze, Steve's Flag & UD, Spooks and Stalker Reward.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 13 This episode includes: Skull Duggery, Deadly RX & UD, Children of Heaven and Not Home for the Holidays & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 This episode includes: Kecksburg UFO (Pts. 1 & 2), Update: Pizza Man & 3rd Anniversary Reunion, Unknown Arsonist & UD and Hospital Babynap.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 This episode includes: Reincarnated Submariner (Pts. 1 & 2), UD: Cult of Decloud, Chicago Hit & Run and Tornado Disappearance & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 17
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 This episode includes: Alcatraz.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 24
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 This episode includes: Broken Hearts & UD, Burning Car & UD, Armored Car Killings & UD and Amnesia Victim.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 19
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 19 This episode includes: RFK Pix & UD, Lady in Black, Vigilante and Shelly Loved Horses.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 10
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 10 This episode includes: Ice Woman, Airline Employee Murder, Silicon Valley Hit, Florida Crime Spree & UD and Elvis, The Twinless Twin.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 6
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 This episode includes: Lake Wales Haunting (Pts. 1 & 2), Bomb Shelter Friends & UD, Murder in Agawam, UD: Surprise Sister and Down to the Wire.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 13 This episode includes: Newlywed Escape & UD, Gettysburg Ghosts, Trucker Disappearance & UD and Magic, the Gathering.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 This episode includes: Vice Cop, Update: Florida Flim Flam, Where's the Witness? & UD, Update: Thank You Phillip, Lost Sister Jackie & UD and Missing Ex-Monk & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Slime People - The Slime People
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 The crew puts Commando Cody on trial for crimes against reality after watching the sixth episode of Radar Men while slime monsters invade Los Angeles in The Slime People.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 3: Crashing Towers
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 The final chapter of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 1: Beneath The Ocean Floor
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 A scientist and a reporter discover the lost city of Atlantis, a technologically advanced society.

programme.title: MST3K: The Creeping Terror - MST3K: The Creeping Terror
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the 'bots watch The Creeping Terror (1964), with its infamous walking-carpet monster, and parody Love, American Style (1969).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Junior Rodeo Daredevils
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A prank gone wrong leads to children taking on a dangerous new sport.

programme.title: MST3K: The Beatniks - MST3K: The Beatniks
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a hold-up carried out by his two-bit hoodlum friends goes tragically awry, Eddie Craneâ€™s bright future as a recording artist from the mean streets could be in jeopardy.

programme.title: MST3K: The Painted Hills - The Painted Hills
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.

programme.title: MST3K: The She-Creature - MST3K: The She-Creature
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The SOL crew is subjected to a dark, dreary tale of hypnotism, murder, and chesty amphibians.

programme.title: MST3K: Doctor Mordrid - MST3K: Doctor Mordrid
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.

programme.title: MST3K: The Undead - MST3K: The Undead
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A woman gets hypnotized back into her Dark Age'd past life while Tom takes a crack at being an observer.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Cities - A Tale of Two Cities
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

programme.title: Christmas in Conway - Christmas in Conway
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: A Majestic Christmas - A Majestic Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Nell must take her hometown playhouse to a multiplex, against her own wishes. She hopes a crash course in Christmas will give the new owner, Connor, a change of heart. Stars Jerrika Hinton and Christian Vincent.

programme.title: Wedding of Dreams - Wedding of Dreams
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. In the sequel to Summer of Dreams, it's been a year since Debbie's smash hit.

programme.title: The Makeover - The Makeover
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hannah Higgins--a smart, driven Harvard-educated professor--attempts to turn blue-collar Boston beer vendor Elliot Doolittle into a viable candidate for Congress and inadvertently learns something of Elliot's side of life.

programme.title: Pictures of Hollis Woods - Pictures of Hollis Woods
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Having run away from a succession of foster homes, a 12-year-old girl resorts to desperate measures to stay with the eccentric retired teacher who's made her feel like she's finally in the place where she belongs.

programme.title: Front of the Class - Front of the Class
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Based on the true story of Brad Cohen, who, after being challenged by Tourette's syndrome from a very young age, defies all odds to become a gifted teacher.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Moebius (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 19 Jackson receives documents that point to the location of a ZPM in ancient Egypt. Hoping that the energy source could be used to power Earth's defenses and open a wormhole to Atlantis, SG-1 uses an ancient time machine to travel back to 3000 B.C.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Moebius (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 20 SG-1's attempt to recover a ZPM from 3000 B.C. has altered the timeline, leading to a present where the Stargate was never discovered! The alternate-reality Carter and Jackson convince a reluctant O'Neill to take them on their first mission through.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Avalon (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 1 Lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell, the newest member of the SG-1 team, sets out on a mission with Daniel Jackson, Teal'c and Vala to uncover a stash of hidden ancient riches. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Avalon (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 Still bound together by the Jaffa bracelets, Daniel Jackson and Vala are transported to a galaxy populated by worshippers of a potentially threatening authority called the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Origin
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 3 Daniel and Vala learn that their reactivation of an ancient communications device has inadvertently exposed Earth to the wrath of the group of unforgiving deities called Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Ties That Bind
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 4 Daniel Jackson and Vala embark on a series of dangerous missions in their quest to unlock the frustrating Jaffa bracelets that seems to have bound them together for eternity. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Powers That Be
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 5 When Daniel and Vala attempt to undo the teachings of the Ori on a distant planet, they and the planet's inhabitants find themselves subject to their foe's vengeful wrath. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Beachhead
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 6 The brilliant astrophysicist and former member Samantha Carter returns to SG-1 to join the team on a mission to free a distant planet called Kallana from the Ori's control. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michael’s flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Seed
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Broken Ties
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release a mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Shrine
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 6 On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.
